snippet: Consumers who cannot or will not understand mortgage disclosures should be required to hire mortgage counselors.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Jeff Sovern supports rules proposed by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, intended to clarify the terms of housing loans for millions of homeowners; says changes are a significant step toward preventing another subprime disaster, which was exacerbated by unfit borrowers who could not parse the long and arcane documents that came with their mortgages
lead_paragraph: Consumers who cannot or will not understand mortgage disclosures should be required to hire mortgage counselors.

headline.seo: A Guide for the New Mortgage Form
headline.main: Help for the Perplexed Home Buyer
